p.strong: Better Layout, Undo Stack, Rich Text Formatting, Copy/Paste

ul.li: The nodes are now positioned on an AbsolutePanel, and their positions are calculated by the script. Left-hand side and right-hand sides are now supported.
After adding or deleting nodes, try undoing this (ctrl+z)
Nodes now can be edited using rich text editing. You can play with the B-I-U buttons, or paste some text from another webpage.
Try cutting (ctrl+x) and pasting (ctrl+v) nodes around. Copy is not implemented yet.
I abandoned the idea of porting this to SVG, because current method works well enough.
